description.value:
You learn the @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.QVIXYJFEAOXHF2SW]{Dread Blade} cantrip, and Intelligence, Wisdom, or Presence is your spellcasting attribute for it.

If you already knew the @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.QVIXYJFEAOXHF2SW]{Dread Blade} cantrip before selecting this Archetype or later learn it from another source, you instead gain proficiency with one of the following: daggers, sickles, shortswords, hatchets.

system.requirements: 3rd level overall and have at least one level each in a Martial and Spellcaster class
